Package controller

Class AppointmentFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AppointmentFormController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class AppointmentFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The appointment form controller that displays all the editable fields a blank, new appointment or an already-filled-out, existing appointment. Validates all data given by user and refuses to save if data is not valid.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  AppointmentFormController.AppointmentOperation
      Represents the creation of a new appointment or the editing of an existing appointment.
      private static class  AppointmentFormController.ConflictingAppointmentTimeException
      The exception that is thrown if an appointment already exists that would interfere with this appointment's date & time.
      private static class  AppointmentFormController.EndTimeIsBeforeStartTimeException
      The exception that is thrown if the end time is before the start time.
      private static class  AppointmentFormController.FieldBlankException
      The exception that is thrown if one or more fields are blank when trying to save the appointment.
      private static class  AppointmentFormController.OutsideOfOfficeHoursException
      The exception that is thrown if either the startsAt or endsAt time for the appointment are out of bounds for office hours.

      void addNewAppointment()
      Invoked by the MainController when the "Add" button is clicked, and sets the fields & labels accordingly.

      Takes all the user-input values in the form fields and sets the appropriate attributes in the appointment model.

      Checks the user input and verifies that: no fields are blank; the time values are formatted correctly; the starting time is before the ending time; the appointment times do not conflict with another appointment; or the appointment is within office hours.
      The lambda in this method removes the current appointment from the list of conflicting appointments.

      Applies the fields to the appointment model and saves changes to the database

        private void createAppointment()

      • checkFields

        private void checkFields()
                  throws AppointmentFormController.FieldBlankException,
                         java.time.format.DateTimeParseException,
                         AppointmentFormController.EndTimeIsBeforeStartTimeException,
                         AppointmentFormController.ConflictingAppointmentTimeException,
                         AppointmentFormController.OutsideOfOfficeHoursException
        Checks the user input and verifies that:
        • no fields are blank;
        • the time values are formatted correctly;
        • the starting time is before the ending time;
        • the appointment times do not conflict with another appointment; or
        • the appointment is within office hours.

        The lambda in this method removes the current appointment from the list of conflicting appointments. This is necessary if an appointment is being edited, as an appointment has the possibility of having its new times conflict with its old times.
        Throws:
        AppointmentFormController.FieldBlankException - if any fields are blank.
        java.time.format.DateTimeParseException - if either of the time values are formatted incorrectly.
        AppointmentFormController.EndTimeIsBeforeStartTimeException - if the starting time is not before the ending time.
        AppointmentFormController.ConflictingAppointmentTimeException - if the appointment times conflict with another appointment.
        AppointmentFormController.OutsideOfOfficeHoursException - if the appointment goes outside of office hours.
